name: DotDodge
description:
DotDodge is my first game. It is basically one in which you have to dodge some homing 'bullets'. A timer is shown above determines how much time is left for you to win. It may seem impossible near the end but it's not, it's tricky. Dig in for clues ;)

Please let me know how you find it in the comments, and any tips and advice would be highly appreciated.
